Mike Pence , considered by some a possible GOP Presidential candidate in 2012, has ruled out a run for the White House. Benko also said that Mike Pence 's open commitment to socially conservative values would resonate with tea party members: He has demonstrable integrity both in his word and his deed- that is really extraordinary, Benko said.`` I think people are looking for integrity, and Mike Pence 's integrity is so vivid that once you focus on it, I think that's going to move a lot of people.''
